summary: VEH. HAS BEEN IN SHOP SINCE NEW 19 TIMES.  HOOD MISALIGNED,DOORS MISALIGNED, TACK STOP WORKING, HORN STOP WORKING, SIDES SLIDING DOORS DRAGGING, STEERING COLUMN LOOSE, AIR COMPRESSOR REPLACED TWICE, BELT CONTINUES TO JUMP OFF VEH. WHICH HAS ALMOST CAUSED THE OPERATOR OF THE VEH. TO T-BONE ANOTHER VEH. ON A RIGHT TURN FROM AN INTERSECTION.  CHRYSLER SEEMS NOT TO CARE UNTIL SOMEONE IS EITHER SERIOUSLY HURT OR KILLED. BELT ISSUE HAS BEEN BROUGHT BACK ON 4 SEPERATE OCCASIONS AND I AM AFRAID TO LET MY FAMILY DRIVE THE VEH.
